ygData.subject: Re: rez question
ygData.msgSnippet: Res not only depends on which form you use but also the level of the person you use it on, i am lvl 34 now and of course mine gives back no XP at all, i have
ygData.messageBody:
Res not only depends on which form you use but also the level of the person
you use it on, i am lvl 34 now and of course mine gives back no XP at all, i
have been resed by a 39 cleric and have noticed a slight change in my XP
nothing really noteable, however just last night 2 party members died just
before I arrived in Solusek's Eye. there was a lvl 49 cleric there , of
course with the best res spell, my wizard friend who is also lvl 34 got half
a bubble of XP back, however, my paladin friend who is in Hell lvl 30, those
of you who have reached 30 know about this, he did not notice any movement
in his XP bar after res.

Hope this helps
Bree Wyndsdale
34th Cleric of Fennin Ro
